info.title: Hi {userName}, Welcome to Mollie!
info.descriptionFooter: If you want to learn more about our plugin, please visit our official documentation page.
info.onboardingStep1: Sign up for a Mollie Account.
info.onboardingStep2: Enter your API keys in the section below.
info.onboardingStep2TestMode: Turn on 'Test Mode' if you want to only test payments.
info.onboardingStep3: Assign payment methods to your sales channel.

api.apiLinkButton: Get your API keys from the Mollie Dashboard

updatePaymentMethods.title: Mollie Payments
updatePaymentMethods.succeeded: The payment methods are successfully updated.
updatePaymentMethods.failed: The payment methods couldn't be updated.

rounding.info1: Shopware can use currency settings to calculate how it rounds an order’s grand total. This includes the number of decimals in your product pricing and the nearest rounding interval, such as 0.50 or 1.00.
rounding.info2: These settings can lead to a different grand total than the total sum of line items. When Mollie cross-checks these amounts and finds that they don’t match, it causes a checkout error.
rounding.info3: You can use this feature to avoid rounding issues in your checkout. When enabled, it adds a separate line item in your Mollie Dashboard for the difference in rounding, and your customers pay the grand total calculated by Shopware.

data.paymentMethodsHelpText: Contains information about which payment methods are active, assigned to each sales channel, as well as their status in your Mollie account.

support.success: The suport request has been successfully sent. We do our best to reply as soon as possible
support.error: There was a problem when sending the mail through Shopware. Please try it again or contact us directly per e-mail.

description.queued: The refund is queued until there is enough balance to process te refund. You can still cancel the refund.
description.pending: The refund will be sent to the bank on the next business day. You can still cancel the refund.
description.processing: The refund has been sent to the bank. The refund amount will be transferred to the consumer account as soon as possible.
description.refunded: The refund amount has been transferred to the consumer.
description.failed: The refund has failed after processing. For example, the customer has closed his / her bank account. The funds will be returned to your account.

acl.warningCreate: You don't have permissions to create refunds
acl.warningCancel: You don't have permissions to cancel refunds

instructions.textFullRefund: Just use the button for the full refund. This makes sure that all your items are marked as refunded and the full amount is returned to the customer.
instructions.textStockReset: You can automatically increase the available stock by entering the quantity that you would like to put back in stock. Just enter it before proceeding with a full or partial refund. Resetting the stock can be combined with the actual refund process in a flexible way.
instructions.textShipping: Shipping items can be refunded as any other produt item. Either enter the full quantity or a custom partial amount and proceed with the refund. Refunding shipping costs can be combined with the actual refund process of items in a flexible way.
instructions.textPartialAmount: Just enter the partial amount in the text field and start the refund.
instructions.textPartialItems: If you want to mark quantities and items as refunded in Mollie, use the form above. Set your quantities and provide a custom amount for every item that will be refunded. The total sum will then be visible in the final refund amount text field. Remember, it's still possible to adjust this final amount before starting your refund.
instructions.textPartialPromotions: If you have a promotion in your cart, then your promotion is a separate line item. If you want to refund all discounted items, go ahead and refund their total values and the full promotion line item itself. However, if you only want to refund a few items that were discounted, you can deduct the applied discount automatically for every single line item. You can of course always change values if they are not correct.
instructions.textRoundingDiff: A full refund will include rounding differences

summary.placeholderDescription: Enter bank/card statement description for consumer. Max 140 characters
summary.descriptionHelp: This will be shown on the consumer's bank or card statement when possible. The message will be truncated after 140 characters.
summary.internalDescriptionHelp: This will be shown as a local description in the administration interface.
summary.checkVerification: I have verified the total refund amount and the configured quantities to refund and re-stock.

success.refund-created: A refund has been created in Mollie. It may take 2 hours for the refund to complete. Until this time, you can cancel the refund.
success.refund-canceled: The pending refund has been successfully cancelled and removed.

error.low-amount: Please enter an amount to be refunded.
error.refund-created: Something went wrong creating a refund.
error.refund-canceled: There was a problem when cancelling the pending refund. Please try it again in the Mollie Dashboard.

vouchers.VOUCHER_INFO_DESCRIPTION: Mollie lets you easily accept payments in your online shop using Eco-, gift- and meal vouchers—a smart choice for boosting sales and satisfying your customers. The payment method "voucher" is only visible, if you have at least 1 product with an assigned voucher type in the cart.
vouchers.VOUCHER_INFO_DEFAULTLANGUAGE: Please note, this configuration can only be edited in your default language. Please change your language to modify the voucher type of this product.

shipping.title: Ship through Mollie

item.label: Item:
item.noQuantity: Please enter a quantity to ship.
item.success: The order has been successfully shipped.

order.description: The following item quantities will be shipped.

availableTracking.label: Available tracking codes
availableTracking.hint: Click one of these tracking codes to automatically fill in all data.

shipping.showTracking: Add tracking info for this shipment

tracking.invalid: Please enter both Carrier and Code

modal.title: Ship Order
modal.description: This action will automatically ship an order through Mollie. The flow sequence will receive the order number, and pass this on to the Mollie API. Successful shipments and failed shipments will be visible in the Mollie log files.
modal.warningConfig:
Please make sure to turn off any additional automation for this type of action to avoid any interferences.
The following activated features of this plugin might interfere with this action:

modal.title: Refund Order
modal.description: This action will automatically start a refund through Mollie. The flow sequence will receive the order number, and pass this on to the Mollie API. Successful refunds and failed refunds will be visible in the Mollie log files.
modal.warning: Please keep in mind, that refunds might take up to 2 hours to be finalized and visible in the shop. Until then you can always cancel a pending refund either from the order page in Shopware or from the Mollie Dashboard.
modal.warningConfig: Please make sure to turn off any additional automation for this type of action to avoid any interferences.

confirm.pause: Put the subscription on hold until you resume it again.
confirm.skip: Skip the next instalment in the subscription. It continues automatically afterwards.

alerts.cancelSuccess: The subscription has been canceled successfully
alerts.pauseSuccess: The subscription has been paused successfully
alerts.resumeSuccess: The subscription has been resumed successfully
alerts.skipSuccess: The subscription has been skipped successfully. The next payment has been updated.

product.title: Mollie Subscriptions
product.description: Managing your recurring payments is easier than ever with our helpful features. Take your business to the next level with efficient tracking options, simple integrations, and more. With Mollie subscriptions, you can easily create subscription products and schedule recurring payments to take place at the configured interval and period.
product.infoDefaultLanguage: Please note, this configuration can only be edited in your default language. Please change your language to modify the subscription settings of this product.
